message: heard Leo mention on TWiG that net@night is being re-branded as 'The Social Hour' and it will be Amber and Sarah Lane going forward.  It will also move to a Monday time slot (Leo's only day off) and Tuesday now has Mostly Photo which Leo is diving into with Lisa Betney.  I'm not mad, I think the chemistry between Sarah and Amber might actually be better for the topics and format of that show.
To be honest I agree.  The show has been shrinking a lot over recent months in length and content.  Be good to see a fresh show.
I think Amber and Sarah work well together. Is there any info on when we will see this new show/format?
Will this be on the Radio Leo Channel? Also is there an RSS feed to subscribe to all TWiT small video feeds?
I have always liked Net@Nite and thought that Amber and Leo have a great vide together. Sarah will fill in nicely, I'm sure. She has filled in before, I recall, so I'm not worried.
agreed
net@night is one of my favorite shows. I hope they will still be able to have the great guests that they always had
@rcs :)
From what I know, Amber lined up the majority of he guests on her own, so my thought is that the show will be very much the same but with Sarah and a new name, new time.
Amber does a great job picking winners to interview. This includes Leah with convore!
net@night is actually why I'm on here right now
Yea i agree i hope it stays great but Sarah and Amber are great together. Though Leo and Amber seem to have fun too.
I just don't want the usefulness of the show to deteriorate. I've been turned onto many cool services because of it, FriendFeed, Convore, etc. I think things will be fine though.
They are starting this monday.
I feel Leo always takes the drivers seat when on with Amber. This will give her a chance to shine. Amber is the one that finds all of the great guest. She really makes great contacts!
@lessfeet You are so right... I like Leo, and Amber, but sometimes I feel like Amber doesn't speak up enough, especially during the interview of the guest piece
@Ledlow me too. I heard about convore on net@night
I did as well.
@stefanCH Coz Amber is on top of it yoh.
The Social Hour when will The Social Hour be on iTunes.  I'm excited to hear it?
net@night was great! I think that's how I first learned about convore several weeks ago.
@amber FTW!
